question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. snowboard
B. street light
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The street light is partially obscured by trees and appears smaller in the frame compared to the snowboard, suggesting it is further away, but visual cues are ambiguous without a depth map.
